marketplaces.name: maxoreric-marketplace
marketplaces.repo_description: Custom marketplace for maxoreric-superpowers plugin - coexists with official superpowers

files.README.md:
# MaxOrEric Marketplace

Custom Claude Code marketplace for modified Superpowers plugins.

## What is this?

This marketplace provides access to the `maxoreric/superpowers` fork as a **separate plugin** (`maxoreric-superpowers`) that can coexist with the official Superpowers plugin.

## Installation

### 1. Add the marketplace

```bash
/plugin marketplace add maxoreric/superpowers-marketplace
```

### 2. Install the custom superpowers plugin

```bash
/plugin install maxoreric-superpowers@maxoreric-marketplace
```

### 3. Enable in settings

Edit `~/.claude/settings.json`:

```json
{
  "enabledPlugins": {
    "superpowers@superpowers-marketplace": true,
    "maxoreric-superpowers@maxoreric-marketplace": true
  }
}
```

**Note:** You can enable **both** the official and custom versions at the same time!

## Updating

```bash
/plugin marketplace update maxoreric-marketplace
/plugin update maxoreric-superpowers@maxoreric-marketplace
```

## Coexistence with Official Version

This custom fork installs as **`maxoreric-superpowers`**, which means:
- ✓ Can be used alongside the official `superpowers` plugin
- ✓ Skills have different namespace: `maxoreric-superpowers:skill-name`
- ✓ No conflicts between versions
- ✓ You can enable both at the same time

## What's Different?

This fork of Superpowers includes:
- Custom modifications and enhancements
- Additional skills and workflows
- Experimental features

For the base Superpowers documentation, see [obra/superpowers](https://github.com/obra/superpowers).

## Source

- Marketplace: [maxoreric/superpowers-marketplace](https://github.com/maxoreric/superpowers-marketplace)
- Plugin: [maxoreric/superpowers](https://github.com/maxoreric/superpowers)
